text: Mérida U.D. is a football club which plays in Spain. == Name == * 1912-1920 Sportiva Emeritense * 1920-1921 Club Catalanes - Club MZA * 1921-1936 Club Emerita * 1939-1966 SD Emeritense * 1966-1985 Mérida Industrial CF * 1985-2000 CP Mérida * 1990-2013 Mérida UD * 2013-present Mérida AD == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Tercera División 2nd / Group 14 2001/02 Segunda División B 4th / Group 4 2002/03 Segunda División B 13th / Group 4 2003/04 Segunda División B 18th / Group 4 2004/05 Tercera División 1st / Group 14 2005/06 Segunda División B 9th / Group 4 2006/07 Segunda División B 15th / Group 4 2007/08 Segunda División B 4th / Group 4 2008/09 Segunda División B 7th / Group 2 2022/23 Primera División RFEF 8th / Group 1 === as CP Mérida === * 1991/92 : Segunda División - 7th * 1992/93 : Segunda División - 9th * 1993/94 : Segunda División - 9th * 1994/95 : Segunda División - 1st * 1995/96 : La Liga - 21st * 1996/97 : Segunda División - 1st * 1997/98 : La Liga - 19th * 1998/99 : Segunda División - 10th * 1999/00 : Segunda División - 6th Category:1912 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in Spain Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Province of Badajoz
title: Mérida UD
